trans-unit.source: The type of channel the factory produces.
trans-unit.target: 處理站所產生之通道的型別。

trans-unit.source: Provides a common base implementation for channel factories on the client to create channels of a specified type connected to a specified address.
trans-unit.target: 提供用戶端上通道處理站的通用基底實作，以建立連接至指定之位址的特定型別通道。

trans-unit.source: The channels created by channel factories on the client are accepted on the server by channel listeners.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端上由通道處理站所建立的通道會在伺服器上由通道接聽項所接受。

trans-unit.source: Once the channel connection is established between client and service, they can communicate by exchanging messages.
trans-unit.target: 一旦用戶端與服務之間建立了通道連線之後，就可以交換訊息來進行通訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelFactoryBase%601.CreateChannel%2A> uses the specified address as the destination for outgoing messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelFactoryBase%601.CreateChannel%2A> 會使用指定的位址當做傳出訊息的目的地。

trans-unit.source: The ServiceAddress.Uri property is used as the To header in the message.
trans-unit.target: ServiceAddress.Uri 屬性會當做此訊息中的 To 標頭使用。

trans-unit.source: The ServiceReference.Via property is used as the physical destination to send messages to.
trans-unit.target: ServiceReference.Via 屬性會當做訊息傳送的實體目的地使用。

trans-unit.source: This is typically the same as the ServiceAddress.Uri value.
trans-unit.target: 這通常與 ServiceAddress.Uri 值相同。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelFactoryBase`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelFactoryBase`1" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelFactoryBase%601.%23ctor> constructor initializes timeout properties with the service model timeout values when exchanging messages.
trans-unit.target: 交換訊息時，預設的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelFactoryBase%601.%23ctor> 建構函式會使用服務模型逾時值來初始化逾時屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1 minute for open, send, and close operations and 10 minutes for the receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 若是開啟、傳送和關閉作業，預設值為 1 分鐘；若是接收作業，則為 10 分鐘。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelFactoryBase%601.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29> if you want to specify other values for these operation timeouts.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要為這些作業逾時指定其他值，請使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelFactoryBase%601.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelFactoryBase`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelFactoryBase`1" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes timeout properties with the service model timeout values when exchanging messages.
trans-unit.target: 交換訊息時，預設的建構函式會使用服務模型逾時值來初始化逾時屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1 minute for open, send, and close operations and 10 minutes for the receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 若是開啟、傳送和關閉作業，預設值為 1 分鐘；若是接收作業，則為 10 分鐘。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelFactoryBase%601.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29> if you want to specify other values for these operation timeouts.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要為這些作業逾時指定其他值，請使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelFactoryBase%601.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts" /> that specifies the default timeouts for open, send, receive, and close operations when exchanging messages.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts" />，可在交換訊息時，指定開啟、傳送、接收和關閉作業的預設逾時值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelFactoryBase`1" /> class with the default communication timeouts specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的預設通訊逾時，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelFactoryBase`1" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelFactoryBase%601.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29> instead of the default constructor if you want to specify custom values for the open, send, receive, and close operation timeouts instead of using the service model default values.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要為開啟、傳送、接收和關閉作業逾時指定自訂值，而不要使用服務模型的預設值，請使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelFactoryBase%601.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29>，而不要使用預設建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a particular type of channel with a specified address.
trans-unit.target: 建立具有指定之位址的特定通道型別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress" /> of the remote endpoint to which the channel sends messages.
trans-unit.target: 通道傳送訊息之目標遠端端點的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a particular type of channel with a specified endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: 建立具有指定之端點位址的特定通道型別。

trans-unit.source: A channel of type <paramref name="TChannel" /> with the specified <paramref name="address" />.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定之 <paramref name="TChannel" /> 的 <paramref name="address" /> 型別通道。

trans-unit.source: This method calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelFactoryBase%601.OnCreateChannel%28System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress%2CSystem.Uri%29> when invoked.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會在叫用時呼叫 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelFactoryBase%601.OnCreateChannel%28System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress%2CSystem.Uri%29>。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot be overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不能由衍生類別所覆寫。

trans-unit.source: This uses <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress.Uri%2A> as the transport address to which messages are sent on the output channel.
trans-unit.target: 這會使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress.Uri%2A> 當做在輸出通道上傳送訊息的目標傳輸位址。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="address" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="address" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress" /> of the remote endpoint to which the channel sends messages.
trans-unit.target: 通道傳送訊息之目標遠端端點的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the transport address to which messages are sent on the output channel.
trans-unit.target: 包含在輸出通道上傳送訊息之目標傳輸位址的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a particular type of channel with specified transport and endpoint addresses.
trans-unit.target: 建立具有指定之傳輸和端點位址的特定通道型別。

trans-unit.source: A channel of type <paramref name="TChannel" /> with the specified remote and transport addresses.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定之遠端和傳輸位址的 <paramref name="TChannel" /> 型別通道。

trans-unit.source: This method calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelFactoryBase%601.OnCreateChannel%28System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress%2CSystem.Uri%29> when invoked.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會在叫用時呼叫 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelFactoryBase%601.OnCreateChannel%28System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress%2CSystem.Uri%29>。

trans-unit.source: Aborts each channel managed by the channel factory.
trans-unit.target: 中止通道處理站所管理的每一個通道。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject.Abort%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是由 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject.Abort%2A> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that specifies how long the on-close operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: 指定必須在逾時前完成關閉作業之寬限時間的 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous completion of the on-close operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委派，這個委派會在非同步關閉作業完成時收到通知。

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous on-close operation.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式所指定的物件，其中包含與非同步關閉作業相關的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to close all the channels associated with the channel factory within a specified interval of time.
trans-unit.target: 開始非同步作業，在指定的時間間隔內關閉與通道處理站相關聯的所有通道。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous on-close operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />，這個物件會參考非同步關閉作業。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that specifies how long the on-close operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: 指定必須在逾時前完成關閉作業之寬限時間的 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />。

trans-unit.source: Closes all the channels associated with the channel factory within a specified interval of time.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的時間間隔內關閉與通道處理站相關聯的所有通道。

trans-unit.source: This method sequentially attempts to close all of the active channels associated with the channel factory in no particular order.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會循序嘗試關閉與通道處理站相關聯的所有使用中通道 (不會依照特定的順序)。

trans-unit.source: The timeout parameter is the cumulative amount of time available for closing all of the channels.
trans-unit.target: 逾時參數是可用來關閉所有通道的累計時間量。

trans-unit.source: If a graceful close of one of the channels fails (for example, if the channel is faulted causing an exception to be thrown) then this operation fails and does not attempt to close the remaining channels.
trans-unit.target: 如果其中一個通道的正常關閉作業失敗 (例如，如果此通道發生錯誤，造成例外狀況的擲回)，這個作業就會失敗，而且不會嘗試關閉其餘的通道。

trans-unit.source: Failure in this method causes the factory and any remaining channels to be aborted rather than closed.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的失敗會造成處理站及任何其餘通道的中止，而不是關閉。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject.Close%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是由 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject.Close%2A> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress" /> of the remote endpoint to which the channel sends messages.
trans-unit.target: 通道傳送訊息之目標遠端端點的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the transport address to which messages are sent on the output channel.
trans-unit.target: 包含在輸出通道上傳送訊息之目標傳輸位址的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, provides an extensibility point when creating channels.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別內實作時，提供建立通道時的擴充點。

trans-unit.source: A channel of type <paramref name="TChannel" /> with the specified addresses.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定之位址的 <paramref name="TChannel" /> 型別通道。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelFactoryBase%601.CreateChannel%2A> when invoked.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會在叫用時，由 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelFactoryBase%601.CreateChannel%2A> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> returned by a call to the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelFactoryBase`1.OnBeginClose(System.TimeSpan,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 方法的呼叫所傳回的 <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelFactoryBase`1.OnBeginClose(System.TimeSpan,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" />。

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous operation to close all the channels associated with the channel factory within a specified interval of time.
trans-unit.target: 完成非同步作業，在指定的時間間隔內關閉與通道處理站相關聯的所有通道。

trans-unit.source: Confirms that the channel factory is opened and ready to create channels.
trans-unit.target: 確認通道處理站已開啟，而且準備好要建立通道。

trans-unit.source: The method throws one of the exceptions listed and checks for the conditions in the order they are listed in the table.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會擲回所列出的其中一個例外狀況，並根據表格中所列的順序檢查條件。

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closing" /> or <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed" /> state.
trans-unit.target: 通訊物件處於 <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closing" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed" /> 狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: 通訊物件處於 <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> 狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The current channel factory is not in the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened" /> state.
trans-unit.target: 目前的通道處理站不在 <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened" /> 狀態下。
